page.title: 17BRIDGEWATER CANAL
page.content: Canal owned by a Trust but any adjacent land owned by{Manchester Ship {Canal Co.Boats}-privately owned and hire company boats.Moorings at Moore rented from{M.S.C.}Sections in Moore are popular overnight moorings.Canal part of Cheshire Ring.Retail coal deliveries made to canalside premises. Also occasional passenger trip boat.Bridgewater Motor Boat Club has moorings at{Walton.Fishing}-extensive coarse fishing in the season. Warrington Anglers Association grant permits. Towpath also used by walkers cyclists and horseriders. Canal six feet deep at centre. Silt problem as rarely dredged.Banks being washed away owing to lack of maintenance and excessive speed of some boats.Field drains drain into canal but no streams along this length - they are culverted underneath.
